trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of instances of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de instâncias da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault> class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<fault>` element enclosed by the `<operation>` element that is in turn enclosed by the `<portType>` element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault> classe corresponde para o WSDL Web Services Description Language () `<fault>` elemento delimitados pelo `<operation>` elemento que é incluído por sua vez, o `<portType>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre WSDL, consulte a especificação em http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> a adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFaultCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> especificado ao final do <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFaultCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where the <paramref name="operationFaultMessage" /> parameter has been added.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero em que o parâmetro <paramref name="operationFaultMessage" /> foi adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> for which to check collection membership.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> para o qual a associação da coleção é verificada.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> is a member of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFaultCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> especificado é um membro do <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFaultCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="operationFaultMessage" /> parameter is a member of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFaultCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o parâmetro <paramref name="operationFaultMessage" /> for um membro do <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFaultCollection" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> serving as the destination of the copy action.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> que funciona como o destino da ação de cópia.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to start placing the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual começar a posicionar a coleção copiada.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFaultCollection" /> to a compatible one-dimensional array of type <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" />, starting at the specified zero-based index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia todo o <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFaultCollection" /> para uma matriz unidimensional compatível do tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" />, começando no índice de base zero especificado da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> for which to search in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> a ser pesquisado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Pesquisa o <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> especificado e retorna o índice de base zero da primeira ocorrência dentro de toda a coleção.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro com sinal de 32 bits.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert the <c>operationFaultMessage</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual inserir o parâmetro <c>operationFaultMessage</c>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> a adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFaultCollection" /> at the specified zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> especificado ao <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFaultCollection" /> no índice de base zero especificado.

trans-unit.source: If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Se o número de itens na coleção já for igual a capacidade da coleção, a capacidade é duplicada, automaticamente realocando a matriz interna antes do novo elemento é inserido.

trans-unit.source: If the `index` parameter is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, the `bindingOperationFault` parameter is added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o `index` parâmetro for igual ao <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, o `bindingOperationFault` parâmetro é adicionado ao final da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos após o ponto de inserção se mover para baixo para acomodar o novo elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> specified by the parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> especificado pelo parâmetro no qual ele foi passado.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> whose value is modified or returned.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> cujo valor é modificado ou retornado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of an <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> at the specified zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de um <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> no índice de base zero especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="OperationFault" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="OperationFault" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> returned.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> retornado.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> by its name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> por seu nome.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="OperationFault" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="OperationFault" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> a ser removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFaultCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove a primeira ocorrência do <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault" /> especificado do <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFaultCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método executa uma pesquisa linear; Portanto, o tempo médio de execução é proporcional ao <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The elements that follow the removed <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault> move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos que seguem o removido <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationFault> mover para cima para ocupar o ponto vagas.
